Modules and Features
Frontend Part
Module(frontend, UI/UX): User accounts interface with registration/login, order history, wishlist
Module(frontend, UI/UX): Intelligent product search, including autocomplete, typo tolerance, and voice search for easy product discovery
Module(frontend, UI/UX): Product catalog interface with categories and filtering options specific to electronics (brands, specifications, price range)
Module(frontend, UI/UX): Shopping cart interface including add/update/remove products, save for later, and guest checkout

Module(frontend, UI/UX): Fake payment integration supporting credit cards, PayPal, and other local/global gateways. As well as promotions support(promo codes with discounts) given by staff(people who manage products) or admins
Module(frontend, UI/UX): Order management system with tracking, order history, cancellation, and returns processing, an interface to leave reviews
Module(frontend, UI/UX): Contact forms
Module(frontend, UI/UX): Notification pop up
Module(frontend, UI/UX): Inventory management interface with real-time stock level updates, low stock alerts, and easy restocking workflows, promotion codes etc.
Module(frontend, UI/UX): Admin dashboard for managing products, orders, customer data, and promotional campaigns
Module(frontend, UI/UX): Analytics and reporting for sales performance, user behavior, and inventory insights
Module(frontend, UI/UX): Language switcher
Backend Part
Module(backend, communication with DB): User accounts system with registration/login, order history, wishlist
Module(backend, communication with DB): Product catalog system with categories and filtering options specific to electronics (brands, specifications, price range)
Module(backend, communication with DB): Shopping cart functionality including add/update/remove products, save for later, and guest checkout

Module(backend, email sending involved): Fake payment integration supporting credit cards, PayPal, and other local/global gateways. As well as promotions support(promo codes with discounts) given by staff(people who manage products) or admins
Module(backend, communication with DB): Order management system with tracking, order history, cancellation, and returns processing, reviews system
Module(backend): Email sending system
Module(backend, communication with DB): Inventory management interface with real-time stock level updates, low stock alerts, and easy restocking workflows, promotion codes etc.
Module(backend, communication with DB): Admin dashboard for managing products, orders, customer data, and promotional campaigns
Module(backend, communication with DB): Analytics and reporting for sales performance, user behavior, and inventory insights
